fixes.name: Calculation1
fixes.dax_expression: SWITCH(TRUE(), 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = \"Furniture\", \"furniture\", 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = \"Office Supplies\", \"office supplier\", 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = \"Technology\", \"technology\", 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category])
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level transformation mapping Category values to corresponding strings; returns the original category if none of the specified cases match.
